document_data.mainbody: Khelben Arunsun the Younger is a human born to Zelphar Arunsun and Lhestyn in Waterdeep in 1302 DR. Although most people know him as the "Blackstaff," he actually left Faer√ªn to travel the planes, and his identity was taken by his grandfather, Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun the Elder.
